channel.title: Adding new things to a players mainsave 508/525
channel.description:
Just wondering... How do I add a new int to a players mainsave? e.g. pkPoints
I have added this to player.java: [code]public int pkPoints;[/code] and this to appendDeath method: [code]opp.pkPoints++;[/code] So that it adds a pkPoint per death to an opponent.
And in filemanager.java: [code] stream.writeString("pkPoints: " +p.pkPoints);[/code] to the methods: saveCharacter and saveBackup
but now this is where I get stuck... In filemanager.java with the method: loadCharacter, I don't know how to add the pkPoints. I've tried many things but it always corrupts my mainsave and wont load until I change it back.... [code] p.rights = Integer.parseInt(line.substring(7));[/code] is underneath each int. I think the corruption is being made because of the different numbers in 'line.substring(x)' Can anyone help me in any way?

item.title: Adding new things to a players mainsave 508/525
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Jazzelhawk:

Thank you so much was stuck on that for about 30 mins

You’re welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new things to a players mainsave 508/525
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Jazzelhawk:

Hmm I don’t understand, Could you explain a little more?

I don’t know how I can explain it more clearly.

the “7” is what you need to change according to how long your string is. A.K.A. how long your declared int or whatever is.

item.title: Adding new things to a players mainsave 508/525
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Jazzelhawk, post:1, topic:426546”]Just wondering… How do I add a new int to a players mainsave? e.g. pkPoints

I have added this to player.java:

and this to appendDeath method:

So that it adds a pkPoint per death to an opponent.

And in filemanager.java:

to the methods: saveCharacter and saveBackup

but now this is where I get stuck…
In filemanager.java with the method: loadCharacter, I don’t know how to add the pkPoints. I’ve tried many things but it always corrupts my mainsave and wont load until I change it back…

You need to change p.rights = Integer.parseInt(line.substring(7)); The “7” in it to correct the line. It needs to be a higher number based on how long the string is.

Read full topic
